title: Rise of the Billionaire
description: Dreaming of Alethea gave Jeremy Kater the strength to survive a difficult childhood. Now that he has influential friends who owe him some big favors, he’s determined to become the kind of man Alethea would be interested in: rich and dangerous. Jeisa Borreto was hired to help Jeremy morph into that man. It’s a job she would enjoy, if it weren’t tearing her heart to pieces.How can she help him change once she’s realized she’s fallen in love with the man he’s always been?Hint: Sleeping with him doesn't help.
author: Ruth Cardello
